comment.author: 고상호
comment.content: May I ask what kind of position, industry, develop environment you had interview? It is so picky.

post.content:
The followins are one of them asked during the recent telephone interview.
1) What is the difference between inner and outer join ? 2) Tell me how to implement when you receive message in the JMS. 3) Please tell the MVC in the struts context ...
Hope it is useful to who might be interested.
post.title: Technical question...
